version_description:
+ Fixed label issue on Bookmark View
+ UI Improvements
+ Performance improvements

V1.2:
+ You can now record with video commentary!
+ Performance improvements
+ iOS 11 compatibility

V2.0:
+ Enhanced compatibility for iPhone X
+ UI improvements
+ Ability to save the recorded video to the app

V3.0.1:
Fixed bug when sharing video as Pro user

V3.0:
+ Global screen recording with iOS 11
+ Add video reactions to your recordings
+ Edit your video length with trimming option
+ UI improvements
+ Enhanced tutorial videos

+ Fixed a bug where recordings resulted in unplayable videos
+ Performance and stability improvements

We've improved and added new video editing capabilities:
+ Enhanced video trimming for better export quality
+ You can now rotate your video
+ You can add filters to your video

Also, we have fixed UI issues, and optimize the app for better performance.

Enjoy!

We upgraded the video editor capabilities:
+ You can now change the aspect ratio of your video for easier exporting to other apps
+ You can customize the background color of your video

Also, we fixed some bugs.

Enjoy!

+ You can now edit the playback rate for faster or slower videos
+ Improved UI
+ Performance improvements

Thanks for the support!

The best screen recorder just got better:
◉ Improved our video reactions tool: You can now edit reaction position, size and shape.
◉ You can now start video recording right from the app (iOS 12)
◉ Better design and user experience
◉ Performance improvements under the hood

If you are enjoying Record it! and have a spare minute, we'd be delighted if you could leave a rating or review on the App Store. Thank you!

+ Improved reactions processing time
+ You can now react to YouTube videos
+ UI improvements

Thanks for the feedback guys! Keep sending us suggestion so we can continue improving the app.

+ Fixed orientation issue when recording a reaction
+ You can now rotate your device to landscape on iPhone (so you can record landscape content in a more efficient way)
+ Fixed orientation issues when recording a reaction

+ You can now configure the recording resolution, bitrate and framerate
+ You can now edit the name of the video recording
+ UI Improvements
+ Fixes a crashing issue on some devices
+ Performance improvement on YouTube video uploading
+ UI Improvements
+ Fix a bug when renaming videos
+ Performance improvements

+ Fixed issue when reaction to videos
+ Video sharing improvements

+ Fixed issue where videos are not playing
+ UI improvements
+ Fix for In App Purchase bug
+ App Tracking Transparency improvements for a better ads experience
+ Fix for duplicate recordings
